channel.title: Hell yeah! Oldschool Thrash is back in action
channel.description:
http://uk.youtube.com/watch?v=PyfjXMeBrfU http://uk.youtube.com/watch?v=Hr9wObkGTYM http://uk.youtube.com/watch?v=cCzfn0Uc-mM
Fucking awesome, sounds just like the late 80's scene. Agressive, fast, technical and makes you want to enter a fucking mosh-pit! Unlike the new pussy music this has balls.
Comments etc.

item.title: Hell yeah! Oldschool Thrash is back in action
item.dc:creator: @Speljohan Speljohan
item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

Yes this is obviously not music for everyone It’s just that music like this has been rare since the early 90’s. After the grunge movement faggotry *core music came in and claimed to be “metal” and “hard” when they all play the exact same thing over and over again without any musical proficiency at all.

That’s why i see this as a blessing for metal, it’s going back to what it once was. To have fun, not to make money.

Read full topic
item.source: Hell yeah! Oldschool Thrash is back in action

item.title: Hell yeah! Oldschool Thrash is back in action

It’s not bad, but I rather listen to Folk metal. This is good to listen to when bored though.
